title: The Secret of the Dragon Balls
summary: Goku’s afternoon of fishing is interrupted by a bossy teenage girl with a red ribbon named Bulma who is determined to get her hands on his most prized possession - a mysterious ball that belonged to his grandfather.

title: The Emperor's Quest
summary: Goku and Bulma aren’t the only ones looking for Dragon Balls. The little warrior runs into a couple of Emperor Pilaf’s henchmen during his search for a late night snack.

title: The Nimbus Cloud of Roshi
summary: Bulma gets annoyed when Goku slows things down to help a lost turtle, but his good deed could speed up their quest to collect the seven Dragon Balls.

title: Oolong the Terrible
summary: Another Dragon Ball is discovered in a small village with a big problem. Before Bulma can claim the fifth magic ball, Goku must do battle with Oolong the Terrible!

title: Yamcha the Desert Bandit
summary: Oolong joins the quest to locate the final two Dragon Balls, but the adventurers are interrupted by a desert dweller with ties to Goku’s past.

title: Keep an Eye on the Dragon Balls
summary: The magic Dragon Balls are sought for many reasons. Oolong and Yamcha want success with women, Bulma wants a hot date, and Goku probably just wants something to eat.

title: The Ox King on Fire Mountain
summary: Bulma’s got a hunch about where to find another Dragon Ball. Unfortunately, it’s guarded by the Ox-King, and he won’t give it up unless he gets something in return.

title: The Kamehameha Wave
summary: Goku and Chi-Chi are sent to borrow a magic fan from Roshi. When the old master can’t find it, he returns to Fire Mountain with his Kamehameha Wave!

title: Boss Rabbit's Magic Touch
summary: Bulma’s getting free stuff all over town, but it’s not because she’s so good looking. It seems her outfit reminds the villagers of a bad guy named Boss Rabbit.

title: The Dragon Balls are Stolen!
summary: As the adventurers were closed in on the seventh and final Dragon Ball after Goku successfully defeated Boss Rabbit, Bulma and Oolong argue over what their wish should be - but it might not even matter.

title: The Penalty is Pinball
summary: Goku, Bulma, and the others momentarily escape their prison only to find themselves trapped in a deadly game of pinball where Emperor Pilaf controls all the balls!

title: A Wish to the Eternal Dragon
summary: Pilaf demands revenge for his wasted wish, so he puts Oolong and company in a room designed to cook them alive! There’s no way out - unless Goku can release the beast within!

title: The Legend of Goku
summary: The Emperor may have captured Goku’s human form, but once the little man takes a look at the moon, nothing - except maybe a pair of scissors - can stop him!
